Class MarbleMarket

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MarbleMarket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
this class represents the MarbleMarket containing all marbles.

    • MarbleMarket

      public MarbleMarket​(int nRow, int nCol, java.util.ArrayList<Marble> marbles)
      This method is the class constructor
      Parameters:
      nRow - , nCol number of rows and columns of the marble market;
      marbles - : list of marbles to put in the market

  • Method Details

    • getFreeMarble

      public Marble getFreeMarble()
      This method returns the free marble, which is the one that is not in the grid and has to be inserted after purchase
      Returns:
      free marble (Type: Marble)

    • buy

      public java.util.List<Marble> buy​(int row, int column)
      this method returns the list of marbles selected to the player; they cabn correspond to a row or a column of the market. this method also rearranges the marble market after purchase
      Parameters:
      row - : if the player wants to buy a row, it is the index of that row. if the player wants to buy a column it's -1;
      column - : it is the column index if the player wants to buy a column, otherwise it is -1;
      Returns:
      list of marbles selected

    • getMarble

      public Marble getMarble​(int row, int column)
      Parameters:
      row - tha market's row index
      column - the market's column index
      Returns:
      the marble in that position

    • marbles

      public Marble[][] marbles()
      Returns:
      the marble market
